## Source: kam193 (8d270b59cbf41a6cbe26db37b70cc356a5c81c4f9bee5a30daa76a32d8883778)
Once imported, the package scans the disk looking for Telegram Desktop files and exfiltrate them to a hardcoded remote target.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.
